ComicInfo.Title: Jackknife
ComicInfo.Summary: Everything heats up when Dom and Birdie find themselves trapped in the truck by another unending mass of monsters. But a sudden revelation changes the nature of their mission and poses more questions about their cargo than answers.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-07 10:31:44. [CVDB999477] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 05:09:33. [Issue ID 2553560]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Gabriel Hernandez Walta,Gabriel H. Walta,Gabriel H. Walta
ComicInfo.Inker: Gabriel Hernandez Walta,Gabriel H. Walta,Gabriel H. Walta
